thread.title: ’Tis the Season for Green Cuisine

author: Charles Passy
title: ’Tis the Season for Green Cuisine
text:
These are the true salad days for some New York City restaurateurs.
Fast-casual dining spots that specialize in the green stuff say they are seeing a sizable uptick in sales since the start of the new year. It is a post-holiday cycle that practically has become baked—or tossed—into their business model.
“January is gangbusters. I think everyone’s...
